value.title: DAX Fridays #16: DATEADD
value.excerpt: DATEADD is a really useful function to create sets of dates backwords or forward from a point in time. It is used for Previous date calculations. In this video, I show you how it works.  Link to DAX Studio: https://daxstudio.codeplex.com/  Link to YTD video and Power BI file: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5WGOTsYngCI
